createEvent.description: Create a new event in macOS calendar
createEvent.title: Event title
createEvent.allDay: Whether this is an all-day event. If true, the event will be created as an all-day event, start time will be adjusted to 00:00 of the day, and end time will be adjusted to 00:00 of the day after the end date

listWeekEvents.description: List events for a specified week

fixEventTimes.description: Fix incorrect event times (correct from midnight to proper time)

errors.invalidDateFormat: Invalid date format: {{dateStr}}, please use YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM format
errors.dateFormatError: Date format error: {{field}} "{{value}}" format is invalid.
errors.missingTitleSuggestion: Please provide an event title. Example: {"title": "Team Meeting", "startDate": "2025-01-15 14:00", "endDate": "2025-01-15 15:00"}
errors.missingKeyword: Missing required parameter "keyword". Please provide the event keyword to delete.
errors.calendarNotFound: Calendar "{{calendar}}" not found. Please use the list-calendars tool to view available calendar names. Note: Calendar names are case-sensitive and must match exactly.
errors.permissionError: macOS requires Calendar app permissions. Please check: System Settings → Privacy & Security → Calendar → Ensure Terminal (or your app) has access permissions.
errors.calendarAppNotFound: Calendar app not found. Please ensure macOS Calendar app is installed and accessible.
errors.weekStartFormatError: Date format error: weekStart "{{value}}" format is invalid.
errors.missingNewStartTime: Missing required parameter "newStartTime". Expected format: HH:MM (24-hour format)
errors.missingNewEndTime: Missing required parameter "newEndTime". Expected format: HH:MM (24-hour format)
errors.permissionErrorShort: Permission error. Please check System Settings → Privacy & Security → Calendar
errors.calendarNotFoundShort: Calendar "{{calendar}}" not found. Please use list-calendars to view available calendars
errors.missingEvents: Missing required parameter "events" or invalid format.
errors.missingEventsSuggestion: Please provide an array of events. Example: {"events": [{"title": "Event 1", "startDate": "2025-01-15 14:00", "endDate": "2025-01-15 15:00"}]}
errors.emptyEventsArraySuggestion: Please provide at least one event.
errors.missingCorrections: Missing required parameter "corrections" or array is empty.
errors.missingCorrectionsSuggestion: Please provide a corrections array. Example: {"datePattern": "2025-01-15", "corrections": [{"keyword": "Meeting", "newStartTime": "14:00", "newEndTime": "15:00"}]}
errors.missingWeekStart: Missing required parameter "weekStart". Please use format: YYYY-MM-DD. Example: "2025-01-15"
errors.missingQuery: Missing required parameter "query" or query string is empty.
errors.missingQuerySuggestion: Please provide a search keyword. Example: {"query": "meeting"}
errors.searchTimeout: Search timeout. Calendar "{{calendar}}" may contain too many events. Please try searching with more specific keywords.
errors.deleteConfirmationRequired: Please confirm deletion! This will delete all events in calendar "{{calendar}}" containing keyword "{{keyword}}".
errors.deleteConfirmationSuggestion: To execute deletion, set confirm: true
